abstract: The Tech Talk podcast this week includes a discussion of e-book prices and offers some help with updating your BlackBerry.
snippet: The Tech Talk podcast this week includes a discussion of e-book prices and offers some help with updating your BlackBerry.
lead_paragraph: This week on Tech Talk, The New York Times’s podcast about the world of technology, Bettina Edelstein talks to Brad Stone, The Times’s technology reporter covering Amazon and Apple. He describes how the e-book price war that has pitted Amazon against book publishers will result in consumers paying more for the e-books they want to download from Amazon or other vendors.

headline.main: Tech Talk Podcast: Why E-Books Will Cost More

abstract: Apple, a company that prides itself on the simplicity of its product names, is running out of cat names for its OS X operating system.
snippet: Apple, a company that prides itself on the simplicity of its product names, is running out of cat names for its OS X operating system.
lead_paragraph: It’s the snowpocalypse here on the East Coast, and many of you are having a quiet day at home or the office. So let’s play a little game.

headline.main: Is It Time for Apple to Retire the Cats?
